mapper.select: select schedule_code, schedule_content, schedule_start_date, schedule_end_date, detail_code, semester, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(schedule_start_date, 'MM')) as "MONTH", YEAR from bachelor_schedule where YEAR = #{year} and detail_code != 'BPLAN00' order by schedule_start_date

select year, semester from bachelor_schedule where schedule_start_date = ( SELECT max(schedule_start_date) FROM bachelor_schedule WHERE detail_code = 'BPLAN00' and sysdate > schedule_start_date ) and rownum = 1

SELECT schedule_code, schedule_content, schedule_start_date, schedule_end_date, detail_code, semester, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(schedule_start_date, 'MM')) as "MONTH", YEAR FROM bachelor_schedule WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(schedule_start_date, 'MM')) = #{month} AND YEAR = #{year}
AND detail_code NOT LIKE #{detailCode}||'%'
